_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of covetyce’ — eleven quatrains with refrain: ‘All all for causs of cuvetice’

CULLl510.First Lines:
Fredome honour and nobilnesNeid manheid mirth and
                    gentilnes…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…Work for þe place of paradiceffor þair ringis no
                    covatice

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Fredome honour and nobilnesmed manheid mirthe and
                    gentillnes…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…virk for þe plece off paradycefor þair Ryngis no
                    cowatyce
